en-US.start.user:
Hello, %{username}.

❓ To use the bot, make sure you have lastfm account and press /connect

❗ If you don't have one, press /nolastfm for useful info

❤ Find detailed info at /help
en-US.start.hacker:
%{username},
you have %{qty} accounts saved: %{accs}.
To add and delete accounts, use /connect and /disconnect
en-US.disconn_lfm_conversation.choose_acc: Choose lastfm's profile name to disconnect:
en-US.disconn_lfm_conversation.acc_not_found: Bot had waited for account name to disconnect, but _%{acc}_ was not found. Try /disconnect again
en-US.nonewevents.nots_disabled: ὠF Notifications like *No new events* disabled
en-US.news_builders.403:
Oops! We get error *403*: it seems _%{acc}_'s tracks are private.
Change your Last.fm user settings to use this bot
en-US.news_builders.404: Ops! We get error *404*: it seems _%{acc}_ is not a correct Last.fm username
en-US.news_builders.some_error: We get error *%{err}* when load tracks from Last.fm for %{acc}. We'll check that soon
